'''''Fireside Chats''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[A Realm Beyond: Series II]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to unlock 30 interactions with their [[companions]].

==Trivia==
* The achievement title may be a reference to the {{w|fireside chats}} conducted by United States President {{w|Franklin D. Roosevelt}} between 1933 and 1944, which were a series of radio broadcasts addressed to the public to explain Roosevelt's policies to the ordinary people, especially in times of hardship, to maintain the trust of the populace.
